#labels 分布
 * memcached的分布是通过客户端实现的,xmemcached支持多节点的memcached分布，默认采用余数取模算法

{{{
  XMemcachedClientBuilder builder = new XMemcachedClientBuilder(
					AddrUtil.getAddresses("192.168.217:12000 192.168.217.100:12001 192.168.217.101:12001"]));
  XMemcachedClient mc = builder.build();

}}}

 * xmemcached同样支持一致性哈希分布，通过下列代码启用:

{{{
  XMemcachedClientBuilder builder = new XMemcachedClientBuilder(
					AddrUtil.getAddresses("192.168.217:12000 192.168.217.100:12001 192.168.217.101:12001"]));
  builder.setSessionLocator(new KetamaMemcachedSessionLocator());
  XMemcachedClient mc = builder.build();

}}}
